title: Don't rent till you saw this one $2950 2B1B Lexington
posting_body: Available Date: August, 2022
Beds: 2 Living room: 1 (or use as one more bedroom) Baths: 1
Features: first floor unit of two-family in Lexington
Large kitchen  dinging area, refrigerator, gas oven/stove, dishwasher, microwave & disposal.
High efficiency gas boiler for heating and hot water, whole house insulation by home energy, double pane windows throughout, high efficiency mini split 21 SEER.
Parking included.
Large rear deck (200 sqf) for exclusive use.
Shared Front porch and backyard.
Exclusively washer/dryer in basement with extra storage area.
Entertainment: Pick your own fresh veggies at back door community farm.
Play with farm animals, silk farm.
Family swims at the reservoir beach.
Attending yoga class on the farm.
Running/ bike along the bike path every day.
Walking in the meadows to see a wild bird.
Hiking is 5 mins away on Whipple Hill.
Transport: walk to Arlington height, #77 bus to Harvard every 10mins.
Alewife T station, less than 15 mins drive to Cambridge, 25mins to downtown Boston, 10 minutes to Microsoft/ oracle  on 95.
Shopping: Walk to Trader Joe's, Starbucks, Walgreens, UPS store,and all kinds of restaurant;  Bike to whole food, stop&shop.
Drive to Costco/Marketbasket/Hmart/Wegmans / Burlington Mall within minutes.
Education: Best of the best school in MA, enjoy Lexington public schools, and private schools.
No agent fee.
Water cost included in the rent.
Tenant pays for own other utilities, including : gas / electricity / internet / TV cable.
First month/ Last Month/ one month deposit required at signing.
Non-smoking.
Renter's insurance
Background check and referral needed.
